ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... probably wouldn t, lead ... the EQCheats list mind ... some, and I know it d be ... side.  The only way of ... IP addy of the server ... after breaking any
ygData.messageBody:
---Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...> wrote:
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> very ironic. I post about how something might, but
probably wouldn't, lead
> to what would be the biggest cheat in the game, to
the EQCheats list mind
> you, and I get flamed and called a moron.
>
> oh well.
>
> I know very little about hacking, but I do know
some, and I know it'd be
> hard to hack EQ cause everything seems to be server
side. The only way of
> hacking I could think of would be to figure out the
IP addy of the server
> you play on, hack it yourself, edit your character
after breaking any
> encription on the file, getting off the server, and
hopeing you didn't mess
> anything big up or that Verant didn't notice you as
that would be some large
> law breaking for a game.
>
> but, I know very little about hacking, do know some
so this may be way out
> there also :).
>
> flame me silly I guess,
> Omeg
>
I called you a moron because you said you wish
something came from it. It is one thing to find flaws
in the game design and exploit thiose... but it is a
totally different thing to use a hacking program to
buff your character up to some invincible god. I
don't want to see this game turned into a cheat fest.

Like I said... finding exploitable things within the
current game code is one thing... actually hacking it
is another and don't want to see it happen... you on
the other hand do. Thus... the comment.
-Kenny
